data.name: Behind The Death Scenes
data.detailed_description:
Listen to everyone giving their best to voice various characters of Halfquake, and look at dozens of various notes and sketches.

How to access the DLC content:
  • Right-click on Halfquake Trilogy in your library, go to "Properties" > "DLC"
  • Tick the checkbox to install, let Steam download it
  • Right-click on Halfquake Trilogy again, select "Manage" > "Browse local files"
  • You'll see a directory called "behind_the_death_scenes", which contains the behind-the-scenes files

All files retain their original names for authenticity.

(This was previously available on the Halfquake DVD.)

data.short_description: Contains various bloopers, notes and sketches.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: 500 MHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB Video Card
  • Storage: 642 MB available space
